name: Catrina Mccovery
text: This place is amazing. The venue is beautiful. We celebrated our son's 15th birthday here. Everyone from the youngest child being 4 all the way to the adults had a blast. Everything was perfect. The staff is very friendly and professional. I would highly recommend trying them out. You won't be disappointed.

name: Josh Meil
text:
My son has not been able to have a birthday party for 2 years leading up to this year. Covid shutdowns last year and his baby brother having to have heart surgery in Palo Alto the year prior. We told him that this year, for the big 1-0, he can go all out. Whatever he wanted. As many people, whatever cake, whatever venue. He searched for weeks online as to what he wanted to do. In January, he visited this place with a friend and came home raving about it. He found his spot. He invited a bunch of people, picked out the perfect cake and we reserved our time. When we got there, the two young men working it were EXTREMELY helpful in getting everyone set up, explained everything great and got us ready to roll. The barn for the party was more than big enough to host everyone in a welcoming environment and the paintball was excellent. Pricing was great, and even when we had to purchase more ammo, they were on top of it and it was reasonably priced. We will definitely be back and I would STRONGLY recommend this for anyone looking for a birthday party venue!!! Thank you paintball on 111 for an amazing experience for my little guy!!!

Also, the owner, EXTREMELY responsive to any and all questions we had leading up to the event and always responded very quickly.

name: Zachari Wyatt
text: Great place! Lots of fun for a fair price. Staff is friendly and helpful. I drove from South Carolina to come here and it was well worth the trip. Great Halloween setup. I will be back.

name: Jeremy Oyler
text: A group of us came here for my best friend’s bachelor party and had an incredible time!! It’s super affordable and we really loved the staff. They gabe us so much freedom to play any of the games we wanted, as long as safety protocols were being followed! I would highly recommend them to anybody looking for an adrenaline rush!

name: Sonnie O'Donnell
text: The Host are amazing! Our group had so much fun. We will definitely be back😁

resp.text: Thank you, sonnie! We loved your group!

name: Cade Norris
text: Great time with friends. 100% recommend, at a reasonable price.

name: Sho Wet
text: I went this weekend they were amazing friendly people, that made sure everything was safe and ready to go, it was fun and in between time we had some funny convos with them. Sweet sweet people

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

name: D William
text: Highly recommend coming out to the haunted paintball. We had a blast shooting zombies on the hay ride. Staff does a great job!

name: Brittany Siefert
text:
Had a blast on the Hunted hayride shoot.
Make sure you pay the $10 for the extra 100 paintballs it's well woth it. The staff was friendly and scarry. I would highly recommend.

name: Jason Hughes
text: We had a great time. Awsome staff would recommend to anyone one who likes paint and guns and have always wanting to combine the two together.

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

name: frikpeachscones
text: Defo recommend haunted hayride around Halloween!!

name: Chris Cleghorn
text: It was great!!! So much fun.

resp.text: Thank you, Chris!

name: Jennifer Trammell
text: Had a great time. Will be back

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer! We cannot wait to see you again!

name: Pablo Gastelum
text: Good fun

name: latonya williams
text: We had a hunted time☠😱👣💀🤤

name: Wade's World
text: Wow Mount Doom Paintball was so much fun my son and all the church youth group had a blast! Large playing fields with lots of objects to hide behind and safety gear and equipment to make the day safe and enjoyable. If you're looking for a place to spend the day or celebrate a birthday or other occasion they have picnic tables and Pavilions. They have several fields and help monitor the games to keep them Fair, safe and enjoyable for the whole family. Stop by and have fun out on County Road 515 nestled in the Hills Of Hanceville, Alabama.

name: Billy Mickle
text: Great fun place. Camped on property. Through Hipcamp. Plenty of paintball and air soft. Bring your own or tent equipment. Fun for all ages. Come out meet Doug. Have a great time. The refs are a bunch of great guys.  I can't say enough.

name: Blake West
text: Great place. Lots of fun. Several large fields to play. Referee/guide was great. Everyone very friendly and helpful.  It was our first paintball experience and we will definitely be going back. Thanks Doug.

name: B
text: Mt. Doom offers many fields that are great for people of all ages and abilities. Staff is friendly. The foothills of the mountains are beautiful. Its was great for our daughter's sweet 16th party. Girl power!

name: John Stallions
text: This is a great place to play both airsoft and paintball.  The staff is very friendly and it has a wonderful laid back atmosphere.  Can't wait to go back.

name: SmexyNibbles
text: Really awesome fields! The refs are great and Doug (the owner) is a legend. It is great games every time I go.

name: JASON FOSTER
text: Doug and his crew are top notch. Loved the different fields to play on. This is one awesome place! Thanks again and will be back!!

name: Nathan Hollingsworth
text: Love coming here every few weekends Doug is great. Just wish there was better refs and less A hole players and refs.

name: SmexyNibbles
text: Really awesome fields! The refs are great and Doug (the owner) is a legend. It is great games every time I go.

name: Britton Dees
text: Haven't played but a couple times since tournament ball back in early 2000's took my son here today with a buddy and his 2 kids. Best decision we have made all summer. Awesome crew of people great prices! And great set of fields for any and all ages or experience levels! Was a 2 hour drive and will be making this drive again soon!

name: Dan Goforth
text: Just a top notch fun place to spend the day! Great, great folks running it!!!

name: Daniel Morris
text: As always a great experience for our youth. Very helpful and friendly staff. It's a yearly activity for our group.

name: Mary Constance Seibert
text: I love Doom. I've played here for two years now and like the terrain. The community is amazing and they are like my family

name: Shi No Tenshi
text: This is best place for airsoft even though I have only been twice.

name: Scott Malbon
text: Love this place. Super great people and tons of fields to play on. I drive 3 hours one way to come play at this field.

name: rusty summers
text: Had a great day at doom !

name: robert pitts
text: Great place for people just starting out in paintball or experienced players alike. I have been playing there for years. Great prices on rental setups and paint. Doug is a great guy and loves the sport of paintball. This is one of the oldest fields around.

name: sl0thxx
text: Incredible Service and refs. Doug and his crew of refs are extremely helpful and kind to newer players and The prices they provide for paint, rentals, etc are extremely affordable compared to other fields. Dozens of fields to play on, and multiple  private pavilions to use FOR FREE when coming with a large group. This place makes other fields look like a piece of garbage and I definetly recomend coming here asap! These guys have been in business for over 30 years and they know how  to host a good outing! Also amazing for birthday parties and church youth groups.

name: Josh Smolinski
text: Best airsoft field in Alabama one of the longest-standing airsoft fields to they have several fields to play with great staff and a truly outstanding owner who will go above and beyond to make sure you have a great airsoft or paintball experience I am disappointed every week when I have to work because I would much rather spend my time at Mount Doom they have multiple events every month from paintball to Airsoft and generally the admission is pretty cheap they're open every weekend and it's only $10 to play if you need to buy a rental it's only $20 so if you weren't sure if you would like airsoft or paintball it's a great place to come try it out if you are a experienced player it's also a great place 2 come for events and generally just on the weekends there are do guys showing up every weekend and lots of old faces there too they have a pro shop if you're looking to buy your own guns whether it be paintball or Airsoft and everything is reasonably priced I honestly have a million great things to say about Mount Doom so why settle for a lesser experience at any other airsoft or Paintball field come check out Mount Doom open from 11 a.m. to 6 p.m. Saturdays and Sundays

name: Kyle guns and vlogs
text: great place to play airsoft

name: Nemo In TN
text: The views are amazing! There are not enough portolets!! The field feels like it's uphill in every direction... it's just too big! Not sure I'll be back here.

name: Sawyer Thacker
text:
Amazing!
Every body on their staff is exceptionally kind.

name: Noah White
text: Had a great time at one of White Raven's events Operation Upsalla staff was great feild was great and it was an awesome experience for me and my buddies for our first airsoft operation.

name: John Ballew
text: I have played here off and on since the sport was the original Splatmasters and safety goggles from the workshop. Now with the improvements that we have in equipment one thing has remained the same. Doug and the facilities at Mt. Doom have continued to improve and grow with the times and adapt to the trends that players want in a field. If you've never played this is the perfect spot to learn. If you're a seasoned vet, pass some of your knowledge along to the next generation of players and share in the camaraderie in a family friendly environment.

name: John Faulkner
text: Best paintball field in Alabama.  Do yourself a favor and spend a day at the field.  Doug and his guys are very friendly and helpful.

name: Wink Crittenden
text: The staff is very friendly and the prices are great. Most of the woods are way too dense to play in, but there are a few excellent fields and even a large fort built on top of the mountain. Definitely worth it if you can make it for a scenario game.

name: Josh Jones
text: Terrific place to go.  They love the game and take care of everyone.  Very knowledgeable.

name: CoolaidMan177
text: It was an amazing experience with an all day pass and nice, fair refs.

name: Anonymous Hacker
text:
It's a nice place really, Doug and his staff are all great people. Most of the time...

I wouldn't suggest actually buying anything there before you look it up though. He just ripped my 12 year old son off. 30$ of his money just went to 85$ of his money just went to waste because of greed.

name: Rylie Cirbo
text: A couple of my  friends and family went and it was super fun we spent the whole day up there and had a blast .we are going back soon!!!

name: slimpickins43 TTV
text: Mt doom is the best place to go for all your airsoft and paintball needs including a field to play on it is one of the oldest fields in Alabama and maybe the world Doug the owner is one of the most accommodating and nicest people you will ever meet so come on up and say hi

name: CoolaidMan177
text: It was an amazing experience with an all day pass and nice, fair refs.

name: Jared Freeman
text: Still the best after years and years.

name: Mason Richards
text: best paintball field in alabama all of the staff are great down to earth people everyone should check it out

name: Troy M.
text: I had a great experience, friendly staff, great rental equipment and good players evenly distributed. The only thing I personally should be different is they should have maybe a couple of more game modes, like Trouble in Terriost town, also I think something that would make battlegrounds even better is using red and blue team tabs, I got teamkilled so many times because they thought I was on the other team, I think they should get those and this place would be even better👍- Sincerely, Troy Maharrey.

name: Denise Beasley
text: To hilly for me but paintball games here are great fun.

name: Barbecue AnytimeAnyplace
text: It's a great place to have a birthday party. Friendly staff. It's expensive but from what I've heard that's anything to do with paintball.

name: Charlie Ray
text: Proprietor is very accommodating accommodating and easy going.  You will love his dogs!

name: David Davis
text: Great staff and facilities!!!!

name: cerberus138227
text: Love this field and Doug is awesome q

name: Monking1401
text: Great workers fair prices and good courses

name: Christian Hayes
text: Good refs/staff decent fields

name: Anthony Settles
text: I've played there for 20 years. Awesome place

name: Misty Harris
text: So much fun and affordable.  A must go!!!

name: Simeon
text:
Amazing air soft and paintball field.
Nearly died from heat stroke twice and still had fun!

name: Juan g.a
text: Loved it had a great time with friends

name: Royal Hatch
text: Great place to play paintball. Played here for years.

name: Yammer Jammer
text: Love it great people there

name: Vanita Parker Nichols
text: I went there for an airsoft tournament and it was an amazing experience

name: Levi Maddux
text: Wonderful field with even better people

name: joseph downey
text: Great paintball field, tons of cool events.

name: Joe Thacker
text: Outstanding

name: Dawn Byess
text: Awesome staff, great place.

name: Steven Zavadil
text: great facility great people

name: dewayne ross
text: Great place

name: Brian Pirkle
text: Greatest Paintball Field in the United States and one of the oldest

name: Tommy watts
text: Great place

name: Josh Taylor
text: Best paintball place in Alabama

name: Tommy watts
text: Great place

name: Josh Skinner
text:
(Translated by Google) Funfunfun

(Original)
Funfunfun

name: Christina Seidel
text:
What's
A great place for kids. Very knowledgeable  the guys working as refs are very caring and knowledgeable too  Owner is a veteran. That is Big plus to me. We need more veteran run places for our kids to enjoy

resp.text: Cant wait to see you guys back out! Reminder to look out in your email for a free day of play!

name: E Wv
text: So much fun. The guys here are very accommodating and easy to work with.

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Mrs. Amanda Bloomer
text: We celebrated my son's 13th birthday with a great day at Brothers in Arms Paintball. Cian and Tevon both did a fantastic job with the boys. They led the games, laid out simple rules and mixed it up to keep them fully entertained. All of the staff were attentive and helpful. We will be returning soon.

name: mark and carleen moran
text: Had a great time, a group of 6 we spent 2+ hours on the fields.  Great referees, fun time.

resp.text: Hope to see you guys again soon!

name: Shadowreaper50
text:
Had a blast! So went here for my birthday (no party, just myself), And was treated with all the warmth I'd expect from lifetime frirnds. I even got to hang out with the local paintball team (see picture) who took me in and taught me all sorts of stuff.

If you are looking for a fun place with friendly staff, this is definitely it.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your day!

name: Scooter T
text: Went here for my friends son's birthday and had a blast. The most fun I have seen the kids have without electronics in a long time. The staff were amazing. 100% will be going back

resp.text: We cant wait to see you guys again!

name: S. B.
text: Went for the zombie hunt. Had a great time, we will come back closer to halloween.

resp.text: Glad you guys enjoyed it!

name: John Mitchell
text:
BIAP is the best paintball in south alabama. Their facilities are great they provide a great paintball experience, at prices that blow all the competitors out of the water.
Swing by and play the best paintball at the best price.

resp.text: You are to kind John!

name: Paige
text: Very high quality, not only in the fields but with the staff that run the place.

resp.text: Come back soon!

name: Davin Landry
text: Friendly and welcoming staff with nice fields

resp.text: See you soon, beside to check your email for that free day of play!

name: Buck Shearouse
text: Fun place to play. An excellent speedball field and a really good scenario type field.  They are expanding to two more fields and those should be up and running by this fall.  Great rates on paint. We were very happy with our trip.

resp.text: Glad you guys enjoyed yourselves! See you again next trip.

name: Redneck Jesus
text: The staff is great. Fun games, great fields, and good prices. Definitely coming back again.

resp.text: See you soon!

name: Jacob Roberson
text: If you're looking for a place to play speedball then look no further

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Cody Owens
text: I've only played here once and I must say I was highly impressed .. I played the first go round of the open skins tournament that they have every other month in 2018..... now I don't know how they run when a tournament isn't going on .. but if your looking to play tournament style and have it ran excellent and smooth... these are your go to guys ... the field was very well maintained...  staff and refs were on key and super friendly definitely can't wait to come out again and play some more paintball here

resp.text: Come back soon!

name: Dakotah Barber
text: Cheap and great people

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed yourself!

name: Chelle Ham
text:
My first time at this location and I was with a big group for a hail and farewell. I understand that coordinating a large group can be challenging but at least provide more shade for people while they wait. While one employee was checking everyone's paintball gun we were all sweating profusely in the heat. If this is something that is necessary which I can understand, then for a large group have more than one employee checking the guns to hurry the process. Everyone was complaining. Three people's paintball guns, including my own, had some sort of fault so we waited an extended amount of time to get replacements and checked again. Shade in that area would be a huge plus.
Another negative was all the busted paintballs in the pavilion area. I understand that happens but maybe someone could come through with a broom or provide one for guests to use. Kids and dogs had paint all over them.
Lastly the lack of a proper restroom. One portable bathroom for a large group of people including many kids was inconvenient.

resp.text: Thank you for your honest review, it helps us get better.

name: Austin Bay
text: Went here for airsoft and even though it was the first day on the new field and the group was small the ref and game organizer from Blue Line Battle-sports was very knowledgeable and strict with safety rules which is something I can respect highly.  Clean field - although wood pallets that were mostly used as cover around the area wont cut it for airsoft as adequate protection.  Will be returning here definitely.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed yourself Austin, cant wait till next time your out!

name: Kim Calder
text: Awesome spot to play. My son has been there the past 2 weekends and loves it! We had his bday party there today. They are extremely helpful, very accommodating and great with kids!!! Also, safety is a priority... definitely a plus for this Momma!!! Thanks for everything, we’ll be back!

resp.text: Glad to hear he had blast and we meet your expectations!

name: Ben Jimmerson
text: Amazing place to play paintball. The owner and staff are very professional. Several field options to chose from. They have tournaments and events going on all the time. Prices are very reasonable and location is great. Just an all around great atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you Ben! We look forward to your next visit!

name: Ella Vaughn
text: Place is amazing! The guys that work here are a lot of help and respectful! The fields and paint balling is a lot of fun and well set up!

resp.text: We are glad your group had fun today Ella, we look forward to your next visit!

name: Garrett Creech
text: The two fields they have are fun to play on. One is a professional map with blow up barriers and the other is like a woodsy map with trees, wood pallets, etc. All of the employees we interacted with were super nice  and very hospitable. My group had a terrific time!

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed it Garrett, we look forward to your next visit!

name: Nathan Velin
text: We had a wonderful time for our sons birthday party. Friendly and helpful staff and fun setups.

resp.text:
Glad you had fun Nathan! Send us a email at armedforce01@gmail.com for a discount on your next visit!

-Rob

name: Tango_542 “Tango_542”
text: Fun place, good prices! And AMAZING staff, highly recommend for some fun times!

resp.text: We are glad you had fun! Keep an eye out in your email for a free day of play!

name: JaNae Thomas
text: Purchased the birthday party deal. BEST THING EVER!! The boys had so much fun. They even provided the cake, plates, forks, etc. Everything I needed!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your party!

name: Aaron Gonzalez
text: Best experience as a first time paintballer. Very professional and reasonably priced.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed yourself Aaron! Send us a email at armedforce01@gmail.com and we will send you a discount code for your next trip up to 4 people!

name: Neil Kumar
text: Had good obstacle courses and great service and lots of fun!

resp.text: We are glad you had a blast! cant wait to see you out again!

name: Jimmy Bailey
text: Awesome group of guys and the tournament we played couldn't have gone any smoother. I will definitely go back to play and would recommend it to anyone who wants to have a good time.

resp.text: We miss your face Jimmy!

name: J.C. Sanders
text: Great fields and amazing staff!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our company!

name: Tyler Thomison
text: Never been I'm into airsoft and I was wondering Panama airsoft field is small but do yall do airsoft as well or know a place I can go play airsoft

resp.text: Hello Tyler, we just started to do airsoft check out our Brothers In Arms Airsoft page on facebook!

name: WolfMan205
text: Only Turf paintball field in AL. Great place. Tell them WolfMan sent you.

resp.text: miss your face Pat!

name: Chuck Campbell
text: Had an awesome time great staff.Had a  very enjoyable time

resp.text: cant wait to see you guys again!

name: Alex Crow
text: Great courses and very friendly and helpful staff.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our park, cant wait to see you again soon!

name: ExoThinksGaming PG
text: Best paintball park in Alabama

resp.text: Thanks for the vote of confidence, See you soon!

name: Ryan Thomson
text: Great staff great fields

resp.text: Thank you Ryan, we look forward to your next visit!

name: Victoria Jackson
text: Lots of fun

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Tiffany Jordan
text: Very player friendly, and staff is amazing.

resp.text: Come back again soon!

name: Dylan di Donato
text: I called Bob’s last week before we when on a high school beach trip to be sure he would be open we came to town. (One of the other local paintball courses closed down unexpectedly, so that’s why I called). He assured me that they would be open especially since we had a group coming out. When we arrive, Bob was no where to be found. He wouldn’t answer his phone or respond to his emails. Paintball was supposed to be a surprise event for the students. What a bummer.

name: Davey Scarbrough
text: Used to play here as a young teen between 2008 to 2010. This November a child good friend wanted his 26th birthday there. Found that not much has changed. Mr bob and his staff are as nice and cool as ever. It was so much more fun now then I ever remember. If you want to have a party/gathering to play paintball, please consider Bob's paintball. It's already fun but bob and his staff know how to make it a memory or your next hobby.

name: Adam Duty
text: Bob’s Paintball was amazing! I had my brother drive all the way from Birmingham just to experience the fun and the field. If you want to be safe and have the most fun in Mobile, come to Bob’s!

name: Quavardis Morrell
text: Bob the owner is not only professional but is SUPER HILARIOUS but is very big on paintball safety!!! Matthew our referee was on point! Nice size field good obstacles even a pond and creative paintball games! I'm fron Birmingham and was invited and when I come back to visit this is our new spot!!!

name: Denise Caban
text: We had an amazing time. Owner was very accommodating and helpful.

name: Biff Hitchins
text: Me and my friends had an amazing time. The owner Bob was really friendly (and cool), the ref Wyatt was really laid back and knowledgeable, and the rental guns were in really great condition. I have played paintball at a lot of places, and this experience was by far one of the best. Oh, and the prices were extremely reasonable. I highly recommend these guys for a fun weekend. 👍🏻👍🏻

name: Robert Johnson
text: 16 year old paintball still in operation --- They must be doing something right. We had a great time - they put safety first at all times and we were able to stay the entire day without any additional charges. Best rates in town... in fact -- on the gulf coast. Great staff - family atmosphere.    Thanks Bob's!

name: Tanya Darrow
text: Cool place! Owners were great!

name: Alan Guice
text: Awesome paintball experience for the whole family for ages 11+. Able to rent all the gear needed and purchase paintballs for a reasonable price on site. Nice spectator' s area for family/friends to watch the match or rest between games. Picnic tables and lawn chairs are provided and available. Skill of players attending range from begginer/novice to seasoned/professional.

name: Mike Spurlock
text: The thing that makes this paintball field great is the owner Bob. Really nice guy and it's a fun time.

name: Jacob Pauley
text: Great service at very affordable rates. Highly recommend!

name: marc guffey
text: My son loves it..safe and well ran..awesome tech shop there too for any work or parts needed

name: Cathy Reid
text: Great time lovely field really great prices would definitely recommend to others.

name: Michael Grossman
text: Bob runs a great paintball operation! Safe and fun!

name: Daniel Andrews 15897
text: I went paintballing on the 26th of March, and I had the best time of my life

name: Daniel Hart
text:
Bob's is a great place to go and have some fun. Got a woodsball field and a speedball/airball field that keeps things mixed up a bit. The staff and the refs are great and nice and helpful.

Had an issue with my paintball marker, and a person that doesn't even work there, but shows up often helped me get it working great. That's just the kind of people that show up there. Makes for a great atmosphere and a good time at Bob's.

name: Maynard Hall
text: fun time!!👍

name: Angela Simpson
text: Had a awesome time!!!

name: Kendra
text: Great Family paintball place!

name: Chad gleason
text: Awesome place!!!!! Will be back!!!!

name: Landon Forsman
text: Fun place to play woodsball
